subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa holds the lead at St. Andrews at 6-under par, but the L.P.G.A. veterans are using their experience and guile to make a competitive push.
snippet: Lorena Ochoa holds the lead at St. Andrews at 6-under par, but the L.P.G.A. veterans are using their experience and guile to make a competitive push.
